projects.title: My Portfolio website
projects.bodyText:
-  Portfolio Website made with React
 - Has a dark Mode Support

projects.title: Image Steganography Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText: - A GUI App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Java Swing**.

projects.title: Doctor Appointment Booker
projects.bodyText: - A Full stack project that allows a user to schedule appointments with a doctor made with **Spring Boot && React**.

projects.title: Blog App
projects.bodyText: - A Full stack Blog App built with **Spring Boot && React**.

projects.title: Email Scheduler App
projects.bodyText: - A Full stack Contact Task Scheduling App built with **Spring Boot && React**. that automatically runs once a day and sends an email to all contacts with a birthday on that day.

projects.title: Fund Raising App
projects.bodyText: - A Full stack Fund Raising App built with **Node Js(express) && React**. That allows a user to donate money , integrated with the stripe API
